sentence:
Mr. SUBRAMANYAM. Mr. Speaker, I rise to congratulate the winners of  this year's Congressional Award medalists from Virginia's 10th  District. These young men and women put in 400-plus hours of volunteer  work and 200-plus hours of personal development, as well as 200-plus  hours of personal fitness activities.

The winners…

…Speaker, it is with a great deal of pride that I rise  to pay a very special tribute to an outstanding high school track and  field team in Ohio's Fifth Congressional District. The young women of  the Coldwater High School Girls Track and Field Team have represented  their school ably on their way to achieving the Division III State  Track and Field…
